attributes.action: allow Catholic agencies to refuse gay couple adoption on religious grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that religious organisations should not be intimidated, or bullied into accepting things that go against their principles and beliefs in order to advantage others, neither should they be closed down or attacked.
Lastly we feel that the interests of vulnerable children, who have obviously already had a hard time in the beginning of life should be put first and should not be used for political means or as part of experiment for gay rights.  We feel that the Catholic church has good reasons to refuse what they do not believe in and this should be respected

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this issue:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=adoption
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
